captions.text:
For this fun bet you'll need about 20 cards.
Turn five of the cards face up and then mix

then in with the face down cards. So you'll
end up with a packet that has five face up

cards in it. Have your friend shuffle the
cards as much as they want and then say that

you can place the cards behind your back,
and within 15 seconds, sort them into 2 groups,

and that each of the groups will have the
same number of face up cards. It sounds impossible

but it is this simple. Now there are one,
two, three, face up cards in this group, and

one, two, three face up cards here. You've
won the bet. The solution is simple. When

you place the cards behind your back simply
count off the top five cards and turn them

over. That way, the packet of cards in your
left hand will the same number of face up

cards as the packet of cards in your right
hand. It's amazing and it will work every

title: An Amazing Bet You Will Always Win
